tool.name: VLT.select_sub_group
tool.description: Selects groups of individuals and enrolls them into a new group (which, for the time being, we model as a study.).
tool.command: kb_query.py #if $advanced_configuration.configuration_level == 'advanced' --host=${advanced_configuration.vl_host} --user=${advanced_configuration.vl_user} --passwd=${advanced_configuration.vl_passwd} #else --host=$__app__.config.omero_default_host --user=$__app__.config.omero_default_user --passwd=$__app__.config.omero_default_passwd #end if --operator=galaxy --ofile=${output1} --loglevel=WARNING --logfile=${logfile} selector #if str($study) != 'use_all' --study=${source_type.study} #end if --group-label=$group_label --total-number=$total_number --male-fraction=$male_fraction --reference-disease=$reference_disease --control-fraction=$control_fraction #if str($required_datasample) != 'unselect' --required-datasample=$required_datasample #end if #if int($seed) != 0 --seed=$seed #end if

param.name: study
param.label: study label
param.help: Select only between individuals enrolled in this study. See below.

options.transform_lines: [ "%s%s%s:%s" % ( l[0], self.separator, l[0], l[1][:40] ) for l in obj ]

param.name: group_label
param.label: Group label
param.help: the new group (it is actually a study) label

param.name: total_number
param.label: total number of individuals requested
param.help: It will be cut to the largest number of individuals satisfying the required constraints.

param.name: reference_diagnosis
param.label: Phenotypic profile (diagnosis, for the time being)

param.name: seed
param.help: Seed for the random number generator. A value of 0 will force to the default initialization.
